thread.title: Steve Sarkisian fired: USC coach terminated amidst continued sobriety concerns
thread.title_full: Steve Sarkisian fired: USC coach terminated amidst continued sobriety concerns

author: Daniel Malone | Special to MassLive
title: Steve Sarkisian fired: USC coach terminated amidst continued sobriety concerns
text: Steve Sarkisian fired: USC coach terminated amidst continued sobriety concerns Steve Sarkisian FILE - In this July 31, 2015, file photo, Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian speaks to reporters during NCAA college Pac-12 Football media days in Burbank, Calif. Southern California coach Steve Sarkisian is taking an indefinite leave of absence after athletic director Pat Haden determined that the troubled coach is "not healthy", Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015. (AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill, File)
